even tho i have played this game for 4000 h i still dont understand rank up system... i have 12 wins in a row with mge and i cant rank up... but if i lose one it is insta rank down... i am quiting this game very soon i had good time playing this but enough is enough... even cheaters are in prime with good trust factor... i watch demo of all suspected players and yes they have wh/aimbot or something else... this is too much valve needs to fix VAC and adjust skill groups... its no wonder why people are quiting this "CS:GO"
